Notes: An electric barrier consisting of only two points that damages the player and compatible objects when touching the electricity or one of the points. Each point has a separate path to move on. The points are connected by the actual electric barrier. There has to be a RailObj instance for each of the two points which can be linked to this object using GeneratorId.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Time
Obj_arg0.Description: How long it takes for each point to reach the end of their path. Default is 60.

RailObj_arg0.Name: Doesn't Move?
RailObj_arg0.Description: If set, the point will not move on the path at all.
